articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Cabinet backs policy to allow firms to forfeit inactive coal mines
articles.description: The Union Cabinet on Friday approved a policy that will let firms run by the Central or state governments to surrender non-operational mines without penalty, in a move that would allow the country to auction them off to help boost output.
